name: doctrine-standalone
description: A standalone version of Doctrine JSDoc parser, to work in a browser.

scripts.build: rollup -c rollup.config.js -i node_modules/doctrine/lib/doctrine.js  -o index.cjs.js -f cjs && rollup -c rollup.config.js -i node_modules/doctrine/lib/doctrine.js  -o index.es.js -f es && rollup -c rollup.config.js -i node_modules/doctrine/lib/doctrine.js  -o dist/index.js -f iife -n doctrine

author: https://github.com/NoamELB
